#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
ll MOD=1000000007;
long long int power(long long int a, long long int b)
{
    long long int x=1,y=a;
    while(b > 0)
    {
        if(b%2 == 1)
        {
            x=(x*y);
            if(x>MOD) x%=MOD;
        }
        y = (y*y);
        if(y>MOD) y%=MOD;
        b /= 2;
    }
    return x;
}
ll f(ll n)
{
    ll res=power(n,4);
    res=(res-(6*power(n,3))%MOD+MOD)%MOD;
    res=(res+(23*power(n,2))%MOD)%MOD;
    res=(res-(42*n)%MOD+MOD)%MOD;
    res=(res+24)%MOD;
    res=(res*power(24,MOD-2))%MOD;
    res=(res+n)%MOD;
    return res;
}
int main()
{
    int t,n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        cout<<f(n)<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
